There is no time limit to complete each stage, but finishing within a specific time frame, shown at the top, gives awards and bonus stars.

game.name: Fieldrunners (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: In Fieldrunners, your goal is to defend and control a field using a diverse selection of upgradeable towers over countless waves of enemies, fighting off many land and air combatants to achieve the ultimate victory![CR]Upgraded for PlayStation Portable, this edition of Fieldrunners includes additional content, from new maps and towers to new fieldrunners! Also, exclusive to PSP version is themed music and enhanced graphics painstakingly reworked to make your experience all the more satisfying as you thrash your enemies.

game.name: Fighting Fantasy - Talisman of Death (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Fighting Fantasy - Talisman of Death (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: This version of Fighting Fantasy: Talisman of Death features a Tarot Card character generation system, and the classic dice-rolling rule set you know and love, with optional all-new Battle and Test Your Luck systems for bold adventurers to explore.

game.name: Fighting Fantasy - The Warlock of Firetop Mountain (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Fighting Fantasy - The Warlock of Firetop Mountain (USA, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: Fighting Fantasy - The Warlock of Firetop Mountain
game.plot: Fighting Fantasy: The Warlock of Firetop Mountain is a first person shooter action RPG for the Nintendo DS developed by Big Blue Bubble and published by Aspyr in North America on November 25, 2009. The game is loosely based on the roleplaying gamebook of the same name.

game.name: Finger Connection (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Ready for a finger connection? Start by placing your fingers on the PSP(r) screen. Each round you will have to maneuver your fingers around to different spots on the game board. The longer you can last, the higher the chance of you and your partner having a finger connection. Are you ready?

game.name: Fish Tank (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Fish Tank is a first "Match-3" game that not only offers lots of fun with finding groups of fishes in the same colors on the grid, but also offers player way to navigate new swimming fishes into desired place on the grid. [CR]Because of that you are not only entertained by normal matching game mechanics but also with dynamic, reflex based gameplay! [CR]Game offers: [CR]- free play mode for quick bursts of fun play[CR]- three difficulty levels for different intensity of fun[CR]- 9 different power up types to enhance your playing experience[CR]- 24 levels to face with[CR]- 72 medals to collect to make gameplay last longer

game.name: Flick Fishing (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: An arcade sports fishing game where the player goes fishing at different locations on the map to get the best fishing experience!!! [CR]The player has to cast the line and with a skillful combination of bait, location and technique has to hook a fish. Once the fish gets hooked to the line, just reel it in. The player has 9 types of baits to tackle with and the bigger the fish, the more strength it takes to reel it in however try not to reel in too fast to avoid snapping the line and losing the fish. There are various types of fishes to catch ranging from carp to the blue marlin. Enjoy Fishing!!!

game.name: Floating Cloud God Saves the Pilgrims (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Floating Cloud God Saves the Pilgrims (USA, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: Floating Cloud God Saves the Pilgrims
game.plot: Floating Cloud God Saves the Pilgrims is a Playstation Mini game for PSP and Vita. [CR]Floating Cloud God Saves the Pilgrims is exactly that, a 2D shooter built around the eponymous deity (controlled by the player) and his quest to protect eight pilgrims in their journey across perilous territories.[CR]Your own shots just knock their hats off, but getting hit by anything else will kill a pilgrim and send their spirit floating off with a sad little wail. This is bad not only because the pilgrims are a de facto health bar (losing them all ends the game) but powering up Cloud God depends on harvesting their love - juicy little hearts that pop up whenever you kill an enemy and increase in size as you blast more.[CR]You must get all of the love (given form as hearts) that they release, which then makes you much more powerful than you already are. You increase in size, look more menacing, and your attacks are more powerful. The pilgrims get the most excited when they witness ambushing ghosts and ghouls get annihilated by you. When they are excited, they produce more love, meaning more power to you.[CR]However, you have to be very careful when shooting. You grow weaker with every shot, so try not to channel your inner war-freak and have a little restraint, for the good of both yourself and the pilgrims. You also lose some of your steam if you get hit by enemy forces. And sometimes, the situation calls to for you to sacrifice your mightiness and provide cover to the pilgrims from the enemy assault with your own self.[CR]There are two types of attack: the normal shot (by pressing X), and the bomb shot (by pressing Circle). The direction of the normal shot depends on what direction you are pressing, so there is some strategy to what part of the screen you should be shooting from. Being too far from your pilgrims is very dangerous but allows you to cover more ground, while launching a full frontal assault can protect your pilgrims by absorbing all the incoming fire. You have to think through, in real time, what tactics you would like to employ. You can always get in the middle, then rush forward, then get to a safe distance; mix and match, and you got yourself going.[CR]The bomb shot is used if you are above the enemy. But that's not all, as some enemies can't be killed with the bomb shot, only with the normal shot, and vice versa. There are also enemies where you have to inflict bomb shot damage first before switching to the normal shot to take them out.[CR]Enemies are varied, and they look good, even if they are vile and evil. There are boss fights, too, to keep you on your toes. The Cloud God's powers and the heart system mesh so well that any enemy can be destroyed in a blink - so they've got to be deceptive, sneaky, and sometimes numerous. Paper lanterns send out an arcing flame on death, red-eyed foxes hide in the scenery, imps swoop to carry off unlucky pilgrims and bobbing doll heads send out swarms of kisses. Hands start clawing up from the ground, crows dive-bomb your crew, and demons with phallic noses launch them as languorous, looping rockets. The cheeky oriental stylings are gorgeous, transforming symbols into everything from freaky momiji to dick-nosed devils.[CR]As this suggests, one of the reasons Floating Cloud God is such a pleasure to play is its visual inventiveness, which has room enough for everything from Wario tributes to what looks like a crying poo. This big lump of a thing, which is introduced in a level called The Saddest Enemy, explodes into gobbets of mini-poo that are very useful for building up a heart multiplier. Perhaps they're babies? That would explain the sadness.[CR]Floating Cloud God has bags more where that came from, and despite the Minis tag has plenty of room to breathe (there are seven worlds with 27 stages, including boss fights). And it keeps on surprising. The controls are simplicity itself: left stick to move, one button to shoot and one to bomb. But you soon realise the subtlety of how shooting affects movement and vice-versa, which fairly soon you're depending on against every enemy pattern. The pilgrims, too, are loosely tied to Cloud God during some sections, and learning how to manage their momentum is another little learning curve.[CR]The final touch is a minor detail that ties up everything. The pilgrims' hats can be improved. There's no in-game benefit to this, beyond looking much more awesome, and it's done by completing stages without losing a single pilgrim. Obviously, if you start this process on the first level and never lose a pilgrim, the hats just keep getting better.[CR]Seems like such a small thing, doesn't it? Soon nothing but a perfect run will do. The restart option is accessible, knowing, and tempting. Every time a pilgrim fell, it was too much to take - I didn't see their tiny spirit float off to heaven so much as all my future headwear ambitions. And to be fair, by that point I had four dudes with top hats, two with octopus heads and two with space hero helmets. You can't be replacing any of them with Norman and his brown cap just because some demon gets a lucky shot in.[CR]That's the best thing about Floating Cloud God Saves the Pilgrims. You do want to save them, and not just because they represent 'health'. The hats are a big part of it, but just as much is the sense of pride in being a badass god - harvesting power at the right moment to smash through oncoming waves, battling desperate rear-guard actions against hails of deadly kisses and throwing yourself in bodily as a last resort (which sometimes works!). The little yelp as a pilgrim goes down is a sharp reprimand, a blow to the daydreams of an all-conquering deity.[CR]This description was compiled from the following reviews:[CR]http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2012-04-19-floating-cloud-god-saves-the-pilgrims-review[CR]http://www.pspminis.com/8859/floating-cloud-god-saves-the-pilgrims-review-if-the-indication-of-a-good-game-is-a-lengthy-title-then-that-rule-applies-here/

game.name: Fly Fu (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Fly Fu is a side-scrolling beat-'em-up game with characters designed from photographs of dead insects mixed with doodle art. [CR]Your girlfriend, Kate Moth, a fluffy moth was kidnapped by evil spiders and dragged away to the suburb. [CR]You are not a common housefly but trained to fight. Being a Kung-Fu master, only you can save your love from the claws of the evil insects! [CR]Five chapters are waiting for you to complete! Each chapter ends with a unique boss, where you fight against the strongest members of The Cuticulous Gang. [CR]Features[CR]- watch the famous 'dead fly art' in smooth motion[CR]- experience the intense doodle violence with heated Kung Fu action[CR]- fight your way through bees, wasps, lady bugs and more than 20 different insects[CR]- get really mad at insects bugging around and GO BERSERK! [CR]- arm yourself with matchsticks and needle-pins to gain more fist power[CR]- play story mode accompanied with cutscenes with twists on plot[CR]- put your endurance to the test in survival mode

game.name: Flying Hamster, The (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Take control of Newton, the flying hamster in this action-frenzy horizontal shooter. You will fly across six unique environments, from the sunflower fields to the big Japanese city or the crazy ancient Egypt. Eight freaky weapons are scattered among the levels, and you'll need them all to take on the more than 35 different enemies (sneaky penguins, anti-air cows, exploding foxes, ninja squirrels, toaster-robots...) as well as the six dreadful and unpredictable bosses.

game.name: Forest Puzzle (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Forest puzzle is the game in which you need to save strange creatures called Sparks on 60 challenging levels in 3 different game modes. Deadly creatures like Golems,[CR]Zombies, Firebats and Ghosts will be pursuing you. Complete levels and save enough Sparks to unlock new, more challenging stages.[CR]Find the way to Exit Portal through the numerous puzzles in Puzzle mode.[CR]Rush to Exit Portal in Time trial mode. Do not forget about Sparks[CR]Survive long enough to complete the level in Survival mode with endless dangerous creatures. There is no exit - how long would you live?

game.name: Fort Commander - King's Gambit (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Fort Commander - King's Gambit (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Fort Commander(tm) is a twist on the classic tower defense genre set in the Mogul conquest period. You play the role of the commander of the Mogul army. You must defeat two opposing kingdoms - Lodi and Sur - in a total of 14 missions including two Assault and two Survival. The gameplay is built around the strategy for expanding and controlling the Mogul empire. In Campaign mode, you defend your tower until the enemy population is depleted and then you conquer their tower. In Assault mode, you charge the enemy tower until you deplete their population. In Survival mode, you hold out for as long as possible against an ever increasing enemy force.

game.name: Fort Commander II - Counterattack (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Fort Commander II - Counterattack (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Fort Commander(tm) is a twist on the classic tower defense genre set in the Mogul conquest period. You play the role of the commander of the Mogul army. You must defeat two opposing kingdoms - Malwa and Bengal - in a total of 14 missions including two Assault and two Survival. The game play is built around the strategy for expanding and controlling the Mogul empire. In Campaign mode, you defend your tower until the enemy population is depleted and then you conquer their tower. In Assault mode, you charge the enemy tower until you deplete their population. In Survival mode, you hold out for as long as possible against an ever increasing enemy force.

game.name: Freekscape - Escape From Hell (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Freekscape - Escape From Hell (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Freekscape: Escape from Hell is a 2.5D puzzle platformer. The protagonist is the horned demon Freek who is left behind in hell because he does not enjoy torturing souls. That is why he is tasked with housekeeping chores instead by his master Beel. Working alone, he discovers the key to the treasure room, steals a trident and attempts to escape hell to reach heaven. To complete levels the exit needs to be reached. Levels are accessed one by one on a large world map and they branch out at a certain point with multiple paths.[CR]Puzzles are based on platforming and using the abilities of different creatures. Freek can use his trident to skewer other minions, carry them around or use them as a pogo stick to jump higher. One type of creature rushes and can knock Freek over large gaps. Another type acts as a trampoline. Creatures can sometimes be dropped into the lava to create safe passages. A hug block rushes to hug you. By taking it out up to three can be skewered to use them as a bridge. Creatures are summoned through portals at specific locations. Freek can also draw their attention by whistling. Freek has his own portals that act as checkpoints when he passes them. Some levels require you to locate a number of peppers to unlock a pepper portal before a level can be finished. The D-pad can be used to look around while the analog stick control movement.

game.name: Funky Punch (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: In the unique world of Funkyville, a musical power called the Funky Flow has empowered some with amazing abilities. But Klyde has evil plans afoot and has built an army of Emoticons to do his bidding and control the flow for himself.

game.name: Galcon Labs (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Conquer the Galaxy like never before! Galcon Labs is an awesome high-paced galactic arcade-strategy game. Send swarms of ships to defeat enemy planets and conquer the universe! [CR]Exclusively designed for PlayStation(r)Minis campaign mode to unlock the four innovative new game modes to you:[CR]Billiards: 'Moving Planets' - need we say more? With a constantly changing battlefield this game never has a dull moment. [CR]Stealth: Enemy ships become invisible, changing Galcon into a game of inter-galactic hide and seek! [CR]Crash: Ships battle in mid-flight, bringing a whole different twist to the classic gameplay. You can now defeat the enemy in the air! [CR]Assassin: Each opponent is assigned a target. The first player to annihilate their target wins the round! [CR]Galcon Labs: Conquer the galaxy in five minutes!

game.name: Gamocracy One - Legend of Robot (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Gamocracy One - Legend of Robot (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Legend of Robot is something very special. It is the product of the Gamocracy project, in which The Bearded Ladies invited the PlayStation(r) community forum members to design a game. The result is an awesome platformer with some very unique game mechanics and colorful characters.[CR]In true Gamocracy spirit here is the salespitch from one of the forum members : [CR]Have you ever considered what it'd be like to throw your own head off and use it as a platform or weapon? How about turning your arms into energy canons and magnets? In Legend of Robot you can do all of these things! [CR]It's evident that some of you DO think about these things, because you- the best and brightest of the community, designed it! [CR]- Vincent Pavey

game.name: Gold Fever (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Take a trip back in time to explore the great American Gold Rush in this well-designed arcade puzzle game. Flip coins to make matches and mine your way to Gold Country, California. Gold Fever will challenge even the most dedicated puzzle players. Clever power ups and stunning graphics promise hours of enjoyable gameplay.[CR]* 160 strike-it-rich levels [CR]* New power ups, coins and challenges as you progress

game.name: Golf Mania (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Golf Mania features over 90 holes of golfing mayhem that is easy to learn but tough to master. [CR]With single and multiplayer gaming on classic grass courses and modern courses built upon incredible gravity defying glass towers, Golf Mania offers hours of gameplay for the whole family.

game.name: HISTORY - Egypt - Engineering an Empire (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: HISTORY - Egypt - Engineering an Empire (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: HISTORY - Ice Road Truckers (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: HISTORY - Ice Road Truckers (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: Hello Flowerz (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Welcome to Hello Flowerz, the gardening game where you have fun with flowers. Sow your favorite flowers and look after them every day, helping them grow into healthy, beautiful flowers. Use your flowers to create wonderful bouquets and enter them in regular competitions. Landscape your own gardens, transplant flowers and arrange various items. Put on your gloves, grab your tools and start showing off your flowers!

game.name: Heracles Chariot Racing (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Ride the Chariots of the Gods![CR]The famous Heracles has take on a challenge like none he has ever faced! Our hero will have to beat his opponents in a race across mythological kingdoms and be the first to reach the top of Mount Olympus.[CR]You can play as Heracles and help him return the sacred trophy, or play as one of the other varied mythological characters from Satyr to Poseidon and claim the prize for yourself![CR]Race through 3 racing cups across 10 courses set in 5 mythic landscapes and use awesome fantasy weaponry to defeat your opponents: Zeus' lightning rods, tridents, fireballs and more!

game.name: Hive Sweeper (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Play the classic mine sweeper game as you've never played it before! Hive sweeper offers unlimited number of the classic game set in the unique atmosphere of a hive. Be careful! Crazy graphics, chilling music, will soon make you a number one addict to Hive Sweeper. [CR]What is more!!! Have you ever got bored of playing minesweeper alone? Now with Hive Sweeper it is no longer possible! [CR]MULTIPLAYER mode offers you the chance to play wirelessly over Bluetooth or you can always play online if you have wifi or internet connection. Invite your friend or find an opponent via Game Center. Anyway, get ready for the ultimate battle![CR]Test your brain power, smartness and patience in the 3 types of game style each coming with different cell shapes. Find your challenge! In addition to the classic square board you may choose hexagon or triangle grid as well.[CR]What is more each board type comes with 15 difficulty levels. You are the one who can set the parameters. Decide the size of your board and the number of mines! This way you can start with easy boards or really-really hard ones if you like. Adjust the time and challenge yourself. Or you need a bit more practice? Then set the unlimited time mode![CR]Collect your hive points to unlock all the features of the game. The more you play with the game the more hive points you get. Not patient enough? You get the chance to earn FREE hive points really easily! Not content with this? You may buy hive points for a very small amount if you wish.[CR]Now for a limited time with 99 Hive Points for free! (Internet connection required.)[CR]Are you an absolute beginner? Or an expert already? Hive sweeper is the mine sweeper for you![CR]FEATURES: [CR]-unique atmosphere, graphics and chilling music[CR]-retina display support[CR]-3 types of board: triangle, hexagon, square[CR]-3 board sizes in each board type: small, medium, large[CR]-you can set the time of your game or choose unlimited time-mode[CR]-you can set the number of mines[CR]-number of remaining mines and time display during game[CR]-constantly breakable time record[CR]-easy to control: zoom in-and-out with multitouch and scroll with one finger[CR]-single tap to clear a spot, long tap to mark a flag[CR]-smooth and fast gameplay: tap a clear spot with no surrounding mines and neighbours open automatically[CR]-first touch guaranteed not to hit a mine[CR]-listen to your favourite music while playing with Hive Sweeper[CR]-Open feint supported leaderboard and challenging achievements[CR]MULTIPLAYER options:[CR]-play over Bluetooth or Game Center[CR]-adjustable types of board, number of mines and time[CR]-if your game ends you may ask for revenge

game.name: Homerun Hitters (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Step up to the plate in Homerun Hitters. Play solo or against a friend as you launch fastballs, curveballs, shoots and more! Head out to the ballpark and choose from 4 teams and play up to 9 inning in this fun back to basics baseball game.

game.name: Hungry Giraffe (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: It sucks when you're hungry. Sometimes you just want to bury your face into a burger, or tear into a taco. Out on the African savannah, a Hungry Giraffe feels your pain.[CR]A 20 foot tall, 1200kg animal like the giraffe needs to chow down on tons of food each day, just to stay alive. But, oh no! All the tastiest leaves have been eaten, while up in the sky endless quantities of snacks, fruit and junk food hover just out of reach![CR]Hungry Giraffe features the world's largest and hungriest even-toed ungulate. Through skilful steering of his neck, you can propel your half-starved giraffe on his twisty-turny upward journey, chomping on strawberries, fries, sandwiches and naughtier treats.[CR]But beware! The skies are also strewn with hazards. Poison, Anvils and non-prescription Drugs also hover up there, ready to send unwary giraffes plummeting to earth.[CR]Hungry Giraffe is by FAR the greatest giraffe-feeding game of all time! Dare you miss out?

game.name: I Kill Zombies (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Its time to maim and murder your way to the top of an exiting new game show! I Kill Zombies see's you trapped inside a giant arena fending off the forces of the undead as one of three characters. Do you have what it takes to survive? Who kills zombies? I Kill Zombies!!!

game.name: Ikari III - The Rescue (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Ikari III - The Rescue (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: Ikari Warriors II - Victory Road (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Ikari Warriors II - Victory Road (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Heavy on the action, Ikari Warriors became a favorite both in the arcades and on home consoles. To fuel that frenzy, SNK and Tradewest teamed up again for a sequel, Victory Road, released later that same year.[CR]This time, the Ikari Warriors take on more cosmic foes, battling rock-headed beasts, one-eyed green men and other odd creatures.

game.name: Influence (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Try your hand at INFLUENCE(tm). A new puzzle game where you have the power to clear all obstacles in your way to achieve victory. Move your character across a double sided game board as you use your influence to clear out cubes in as few moves as possible. Flip the stage 180 degrees and and strategize your moves to take out multiple rows and levels in a single turn. How far does your influence extend?

game.name: International Snooker (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Quite possibly the most realistic Snooker game to come to any gaming platform, working closely with Michaela Tabb the worlds most famous Snooker and Pool referee Big Head Games have crafted the ultimate cue sports simulation, with easy to pickup and play controls and months of gameplay as you fight through a pro players career.

game.name: Jane's Hotel (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: You start as a small 2 star hotel owner at the town suburbs and work your way to the top by upgrading accommodations and achieving an excellent reputation. Keep an eye on customer moods and make them happy by serving them fine drinks and dainty meals, or simply offering perfect room service. We will make your stay unforgettable!

game.name: Jewel Keepers - Easter Island (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Jewel Keepers - Easter Island (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Welcome to Jewel Keepers: Easter Island - an addictive match-three arcade action game with mind-blowing visuals and engaging storyline! This game will keep you entertained for hours, as you travel across Easter Island and help to unveil its mysteries.[CR]More fun from Nordcurrent: - 101-in-1 Games - a collection of 101 games in one app. Frequent chart topper in USA, UK, Australia, and many other countries! - Urbanix - an enhanced version of Xonix and Qix, with new modes of play, new worlds and enemies! - Robin Hood: Return of Richard - help Robin to defeat the villains and restore peace in this action game!

game.name: Kaleidoscope - Interactive Synaesthesia Project (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Kaleidoscope - Interactive Synaesthesia Project (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Kaleidoscope consists of level-paintings, which differ in style and behavior, yet are controlled in a similar fashion with the help of just four buttons. The simplicity of the controls is overcompensated by the rich audio/visual experience presented within the game. Player's responses to a constantly changing environment shall have an impact on both image and audio. This creates an illusion of a player being simultaneously a painter of the current image and a composer of the music heard. In addition to that, each level in Kaleidoscope has a clear defined goal, which opens up doors of an infinite synaesthesia world to the masses.

game.name: Karimogi (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Karimogi is an alien that needs you! The situation is critical. Cranes are dropping bricks everywhere and Karimogi needs your help to push them around and put them in order or he will never see his spaceship again. Arrange the bricks into rows and they will then disappear. But be careful, you must stay very alert because any brick could crush you!

game.name: Karoshi (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Karoshi has been played by millions to date to high acclaim.[CR]We've been taught we need to survive. We need to reach the end, save the princess and be the hero. [CR]That's all well and good, but it's getting boring. Who says it has to be this way?[CR]Mr Karoshi is an overworked Japanese salary man who's had enough and his only goal is to end it all. You control him to work through the fast logic puzzles trying to find hilarious ways to his demise in this highly original puzzle platformer with a twist.[CR]It's not as easy as it sounds!! You need to think cleverly and sometimes 'outside the box' to find a solution. [CR]So forget everything you know so far! Join the millions of people already playing Karoshi and download it on your PSP(tm) today![CR]Features:[CR]* 50 unique levels[CR]* Dark Humour[CR]* Collect all the coins[CR]* Catchy soundtrack by Jake Almond

game.name: L.A. Gridlock (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Los Angeles is under siege from gangs roaming in vehicles. They attack ordinary citizens mercilessly. The city's Mayor appoints you the City Police Chief. Your brief is to eliminate the thugs and regain control of your city. You will direct and control the forces at your disposal to outwit the enemy. Your mission is to direct car chases in hot pursuit of the criminals using all resources available to you. [CR]Car chases across the streets of Los Angeles! Place police vehicles on the roads of L.A. in order to hunt down the thugs before they escape. Zoom in to watch car chases unfold along the famous streets of L.A. [CR]An action game of strategy and car chases with:[CR]* 4 Famous L.A. locations![CR]* 8 Levels of play![CR]* 17 Cars and bikes to play with![CR]* 60+ Waves of thugs to defeat![CR]* 100s of exploding vehicles!

game.name: Left to Die in Zombhai (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.description: Left to Die in Zombhai (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Welcome to Zombhai, a city populated by zombies! What will it take you to survive? Featuring a wide range of weapons and locations this game will bring hours of fun.

game.name: Legend of Kunoichi (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Play as Mai, a ninja warrior, to defend your Shogun against waves of ninja attackers. Throw hammers to take them out and hold them off as long as you can so your Shogun can escape in this easy-to-play, arcade-style minigame.

game.name: Let's Golf (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: As the name implies, Let's Golf! is a handheld-golf-game. The game features four fictitious golf courses in Fiji, England, USA and Scotland. The goal is of course to get the ball into the hole with the flag in as less strikes as possible. To make it harder for the players to meet that goal, the courses are littered with obstacles like hills and sand bunkers. In addition the wind decides too where the player's ball lands.[CR]As opposed to real life though, the player can influence the ball's flightpath during the flight by choosing in which direction it spins. This allows to compensate for wind and also for a bad angle at the strike. How hard the player hits the ball is decided by a gauge where the player needs to click at the right moment. The same goes for the angle. Although the game hands the player a club that it thinks fits the situation, he can also choose his own.

game.name: Love Cupid (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be Cupid? In Love Cupid it is your job to help couples fall in love by shooting as many hearts as you can with your love arrows. Work together with a friend to collect the fallen hearts and increase the couple's affection by filling up their love meter. But be careful to avoid menaces in your way and corrupted bad hearts. Share the love!

game.name: M.O.Z.O.X. Space Salvager (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Welcome to Twisted Dragon Media's debut title, M.O.Z.O.X. Space Salvager, are you up for the challenge? A high action arcade style space shooter with infinite levels of play. Use a combination of 4 weapons, and high maneuverability to dodge, weave, and blast your way to the next level. In each level of play you will eliminate enemy ships, weave your way through astroid fields, and outsmart a boss ship. Collect special weapons, shields, debris orbs(points), and multipliers along the way to improve your chances to get a high score. For added challenge the game can be played in "classic mode" as classic side scroller, or get in the middle of all the action in "action mode".

game.name: MENA Speed (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Are you the MENA Speed champion? Customize and upgrade your car then accept challenges across different terrains. MENA Speed is the first drag race game with tracks in major cities across the Middle East, pumping up your adrenaline with screeching tires and burned rubber across the roads of Dubai, Amman, Kuwait and Cairo. [CR]Enjoy the different power-ups by upgrading your car engine, gearbox, cooling system, and manifold to improve your car's performance; and customize its look with different paint jobs, spoilers and rims; all with a wide range of options.

game.name: Mahjong Artifacts (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Escape from the rush of modern life into immersive ancient atmosphere of Mahjongg Artifacts! This new fan-favorite comes with three game play modes which take you through five exotic cultures. It also comes with innovative game play twists, like Special Tiles that allow you to use new strategies to clear layouts, Bonuses for skillful play and Trophies for special accomplishments. Story Mode features epic quest for lost relics, in Classic mode you can choose the layout you want to play, and in the breathtaking Endless mode you remove tiles from an ever-rising tower of game pieces. [CR]- Story mode featuring 25 layouts[CR]- Classic mode with 100 layouts[CR]- Innovative Endless mode[CR]- 27 gorgeous backgrounds[CR]- Five beautifully drawn tilesets[CR]- Music tracks inspired by ancient cultures[CR]- Manual smooth zoom in/out and auto-zoom option [CR]The wealth of gameplay options, elegant new tile sets and easy-to-learn gameplay will earn Mahjonggg Artifacts a permanent place in your collection!

game.name: Mahjong Artifacts - Chapter 2 (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Mahjongg Artifacts(r): Chapter 2 is highly addictive tile-matching game that takes mahjong games in an exciting new direction! Pair up tiles to dismantle hundreds of layouts. Utilize a selection of ground-breaking powerups, earn trophies, and enjoy the game`s beautiful graphics and rich audio. There's more than enough tile-matching action in Mahjongg Artifacts(r) 2 to have fun for months![CR]* Epic Quest Mode[CR]* Additional 99 levels in Classic Mode[CR]* Thrilling Endless Mode[CR]* Five Tile Sets[CR]* Ground-breaking Powerups[CR]* Gorgeous graphics and rich audio

game.name: Mahjong Solitaire (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Mahjong Solitaire is fun and simple game. Players remove matching pairs of tiles from an organized layering of tiles, trying to remove as many tiles as possible and as fast as they can.[CR]You are presented with 144 mahjong tiles arranged in an organized, three-dimensional heap. The goal is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play. The game is finished when all pairs of tiles have been removed from the board or when there are no exposed pairs remaining, or when time runs out!

game.name: Manic Monkey Mayhem (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: As with most fights, nobody really knows where, how or when this rivalry started, but this group of monkeys have not stopped battling for as long as they can remember. Their chosen fighting style is the ancient art of Banana Flinging and although their manic screams of rage may insinuate uncontrolled anger, they are in fact highly accurate and adept banana flingers.[CR]Controlling one of eight monkeys you will compete in battle with a selection of others across eight different themed landscapes with several different game modes to excel in.[CR]All the monkeys will be positioned on small podiums each separated from their neighbours. Use your skills in banana flinging to knock the other players off their podiums, which will result in them losing a life. In some game modes there are crates separating each monkey which can be broken to access power-ups and ammunition, or to simply open up a clear path to launch an attack on your opponents.

game.name: Marbians, The (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: On a mission to collect precious moon rocks, the adorable aliens, the Marbians, have crash landed in a dusty attic in New Mexico left untouched since the '40s. Now you must help them find their way back to their UFO and gather as many moon rocks as possible on your way. The Marbians is a fun physics-based puzzle adventure that offers 72 levels of tricky timing, peculiar precision and tremendous brain teasing for the whole family.

game.name: Me Monstar - Hear Me Roar! (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Me Monstar - Hear Me Roar! (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: Metara (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Use your ship to build towers, defend your base and push the enemy back.[CR]Your ship got three different stances, four types of weapons and the ability to build turrets.[CR]Use these functions to conquer the variety of levels.[CR]The game contains different in-game objectives for each level, spread out on four different planets.[CR]Your main objective is to push the enemy back and defend the planet you are on through different hazardous stages.

game.name: Mighty Flip Champs! DX (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Mighty Flip Champs! DX (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: MiniSquadron (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: MiniSquadron is a side scrolling shooter where the player takes control of a tiny little plane in dogfights against wave after wave of other similar little planes. Gameplay is similar to games like Sopwith and Triplane Turmoil. The player can move freely around in all directions and do various aerobatic manoeuvres such as loops, turns and rolls. In addition to shooting at the enemy planes the player also has avoid crashing. Fly to high and the plane begins to stall and to avoid crashing into the ground the player needs to turn around the nose and dive to regain control. The player can pick up various power ups that fall from the sky. These include extra health, increased speed and various special attacks such as airstrikes and very large laser beams.[CR]The game consists of eight levels each with twelve waves of enemy attacks. At the start the player only has one simple plane available put a further 55 can be unlocked through out the game. Each plane not only has its own look but differs in characteristics. Some planes are quick but weak while others might be bigger in size and have different weaponry. The player will come across many different enemies from simple planes similar to his own to animals and UFO's. Most are in the air but there are also some ground targets that need to be taken down.[CR]In addition to the wave after wave mode called classic there is also a survival mode and a multiplayer mode. Survival is a mode without an end. The player simple has to stay alive as long possible. The multiplayer is for two players and is played over a wi-fi network.

game.name: Monochrome Racing (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Screeching tires, the smell of burned rubber, the rush of adrenaline and enemies that are left in the dust-these are the emotions that drive real racers. However there is much more than this in the world of Monochrome Racing-there is the passion for color! Color is everything here, it is what you strive for, in the world where everything is in black and white. Color is your fuel, color gives you speed, color makes you stronger and ultimately makes you the true leader of the monochrome racing world.[CR]- More than 80 tracks to complete[CR]- More than 10 cars to choose from and upgrade[CR]- Numerous power ups and bonuses that makes your vehicle stronger and your enemies weaker[CR]- Mysterious monochrome world to immerse

game.name: Monopoly (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: The Monopoly video games promise a fresh take on the timeless classic with accessible gameplay for players of all ages and skill levels. The all-new digital gaming edition brings a party twist and features 4-player simultaneous play, ensuring that everyone is engaged and allowing the whole family to get involved in the fun and play together. Faster gameplay eliminates downtime freeing up players to wheel and deal their way through some of the most recognizable cities and landmarks from around the world. Families can fill up their passports as they try to unlock new and never-before-seen game boards or challenge each other to fun interactive mini-games like breaking out of the jail cell and running away with all the loot. Play in offline single or multi-player mode and compete to own it all and win!

game.name: Monsters (Probably) Stole My Princess (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Monsters (Probably) Stole My Princess (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: Mr. Hat and the Magic Cube (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.description: Mr. Hat and the Magic Cube (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: Mr. Hat and the Magic Cube
game.plot: Join Mr Hat and his friends in a wonderful adventure to reunite the stolen pieces of his cube and get back home. [CR]Along the way your child will learn the basics in: vocabulary, spelling, counting, memory, and coordination. All introduced with beautiful graphics, animations and videos that will keep you child (and you) entertained for hours! [CR]Featuring [CR]- 5 different learning zones, teaching the basics in vocabulary, spelling, counting, memory, and coordination. [CR]- Progressive learning curve to retain captivation [CR]- Beautiful 3d graphics, animations and videos to maximise engagement [CR]- Designed by experts in child behavior

game.name: Mystery of the Crystal Portal, The (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Mystery of the Crystal Portal, The (USA, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: The Mystery of the Crystal Portal
game.plot: Journalist Nicole Rankvist receives a letter from Robert, her archaeologist father, describing the discovery of the key for a powerful artifact called the Crystal Portal. When he goes missing, Nicole must find the scattered pieces of the key around the world.[CR]The Mystery of the Crystal Portal is a hidden object that replaces the traditional list of objects names with a different gameplay mechanic. The player has to click on certain objects in the scenery that open a circle around it with photographs of items that must be found and dragged to it. After picking all the required stuff, some of these container objects disappear to reveal a key item underneath them.[CR]Some of the objects have to be collected in one screen to be used in another place (for example, finding matches outside the house to light a fireplace inside). At the end of each stage/location there's a unique logic puzzle game to be solved, involving some of the objects that the player picked up.

game.name: Next Space, The (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Pilot a spaceship, collect various speed and weapon items to take down a multitude of enemies, and restore peace to the galaxy in this vertical scrolling shooter released by SNK in 1989.

game.name: Ninjamurai (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Takezou Nishimura is the offspring of a Ninja and Samurai and in his world he is seen as an aberration. He is known as "The Ninjamurai." Takezou must journey throughout the lands seeking out members of the evil Black Armor Corporation who are responsible for atrocities against his family and clan. Ninjamurai is an action platformer that contains over 20 levels, huge boss fights, various modes and difficulties, unlockable costumes and extra awards and statistics.

game.name: Nom Nation (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Nom Nation is a delicious platform adventure.[CR]You play as Chef on a mission to rescue the Book of Nom from Jabber the Gut, head of the McFatass Corporation. Only the Noms can help you succeed. Harnessing their hidden powers is the key ingredient. [CR]- 11 levels[CR]- 5 nutritious worlds[CR]- A multitude of fun power-ups[CR]Take farting to a whole new level!

game.name: NormalTanks (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: NormalTanks is a fast-paced multi-directional top-down arcade shooter featuring classic run'n'gun gameplay with 3 difficulty settings. At the 8 challenging, dynamic and hazardous environments, inside the enemy bases or forests and mountains, you have to choose your battle tactics carefully to survive! [CR]Over the 30 dangerous enemies types on your heroic way, including various tanks, machines and helicopters, robots and biomechanical creatures, pillboxes and missile sites. Crash, kill and destroy them all to move forward and with help of the red star power-ups, which upgrades your tank abilities: cannon, machine gun, shield and speed. [CR]Some levels transform you to tiny mine-bot to stealth pass near the enemies and deactivate energy fields or to giant walking robot, which demolish everything on his way to the alien's hive! [CR]Try to finish the game without lost any life and save the universe the classic, old school arcade way!

game.name: OMG-Z (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Alert! Alert! OMG-Z! The City of Redfield has been hit by an outbreak of exploding zombies! For cool and unimportant reasons these suckers literally explode when shot, showering their zombie brethren with gore and causing chain reactions of showering zombie gibs with just a single bullet! Armed with this knowledge (and bullets coated in a zombie-exploding pathogen) your elite unit is dispatched to the epicentre of the outbreak. Your mission? Succeed where the police and army failed and clean up the city![CR]For reasons that aren't important right now, all but one of your team is killed before arriving at the outbreak's epicentre, leaving YOU to deal with thousands of zombies ALONE. Use your chain reaction skills to explore 81 waves of zombie hell across 32 environments. Earn 324 shiny medals and cold hard cash, and use it to buy 70 different upgrades all designed to MAKE ZOMBIES EXPLODE!

game.name: One Epic Game (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: One Epic Game is an Infinity Runner video game developed by Czech company Grip Games. The game was released in 2011 for PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, PlayStation Portable, IOS and Android. The game is parody for multiple video game and movie cliches.[CR]The player controls an infinity running character. He can only jump or shoot. Jumping helps him avoid obstacles and traps while shooting kills enemies. Player can also kill enemies by jumping on their heads. There are multiple game modes in game. The main is story mode. There are missions with consistent story. There is a task in every mission (for example getting through 1000 metres, getting to finish with only one life or kill certain numbers of enemies). Every mission is set in one of five worlds - Zombie Outbreak, Nuclear Wasteland, World War II, Alien Invasion and Fantasy Kingdom. Story is told by comix scenes.[CR]Another mode is Free Run. In this mode layer chooses a World and then tries to make the highest possible score. [CR]The last mode is Challenges. Player chooses his task there and then he tries to fulfil it. He can also choose difficulty. For the lowest difficulty he gains bronze medal while for the hardest he gains gold medal. [CR]There are multiple weapons in game. Player starts with Pistol. He can also take another weapon on his way, for example Shotgun, Machine gun, Rocket launcher, Flamethrower or Laser. Every weapon behaves differently. When a player is hurt he loses his gained weapon and has to fight with a pistol again. Player can always carry only one weapon. Player can also take Heart, that gives him life, or jetpack, that allows him to fly. There is a checkpoint at every 1000 metres.

game.name: One Two Boat Racing (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: One Two Boat Racing (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Welcome to the wet wild world of One Two Boat Racing, where you need to use your reflexes and speed to stay in the lead, beat the competition, and be the first to reach the finish line. But there is more to winning than just speed. You'll need to evade pylons, blow by rocks, and make sure to avoid sludge or face wasting precious seconds and losing the race.

game.name: Pac-Man Championship Edition (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Pac-Man: Championship Edition is a sequel, by the same developer Toru Iwatani, done in the style of the original classic. As before, you are Pac-Man and you are in a maze with dots, power pellets and hosts. The object is to eat the dots and avoid the ghosts, unless you eat a power pellet, which gives you the ability to eat the ghosts for a few seconds.[CR]What's new here is many different mazes and modes. This is designed from the ground up as a console game, so some arcade traditions are lost. The object is no longer to try to survive/get a high score without losing quarters, but to get a high score in a set time limit. You do still have a set number of lives, which makes your time end early if you lose all them.[CR]Unlike the original or its prodigy, Championship Edition isn't broken into distinct levels. Once you clear one side of the maze, a fruit appears on the other side. Eating the fruit regenerates the empty half with new walls, dots, power pellets, etc and increases the game speed.[CR]The iPhone version of the game adds two additional modes. In "Mission Mode", you must clear a specific goal set by the game at the beginning of play (such as eating two apples, or eating eight ghosts consecutively). In "Challenge Mode", you must aim to achieve the top score for each course, but this time the ghosts have been sped up so that they are initially much faster.[CR]The look is a bright neon which evokes the classic Pac-Man but takes advantage of nearly 30 years of increased computer power.

game.name: Pachisi (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: The game is played on a board shaped like a symmetrical cross. The big square in the center of the board called as "Charkoni" is the starting and finishing position of the gotis or pawns. Player's objective is to move all the gotis around the board and then back to charkoni before other player does the same. A players' pieces move around the board based upon the outcome of the 'Passa', a rectangular dice used as an element of chance.

game.name: Panda Craze (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Dig, drill, and blast your way through ice and rock in this epic puzzle adventure![CR]Guide Tik-Ling the panda through caves, forests, mountains, and deserts on the way to her home, the bamboo forest. The concept is simple: collect all of the magical lanterns in each level to unlock a magic portal to the next level. Actually getting to the lanterns without getting stuck in the process, however, is not so simple! Dig, drill, and blast your way through ice and rock in this epic puzzle adventure!

game.name: Paper Wars - Cannon Fodder (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Paper Wars - Cannon Fodder (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Paper Wars Cannon Fodder is a tower defense video game developed by several Polish and Hungarian outsourced programmers of iFun4all team, in the cheapest way you can imagine. What's the so-called brilliant goal of the game? You would never guess. It is about destroying all enemies! The same well-known thrilling story, hordes of cold-blooded enemies trying to survive the Armageddon! There are some additional goals to be achieved in different missions and levels - watch your right! The game can be played by up to four players in co-op mode. If you think you need some extraordinary power-ups, you can get them during three campaigns: Classic, Winter Assault and Cyber Wars. ,,Hand made" graphics, soviet style military music and annoying sound effects make players eager to complete each level and collect medals for their outstanding efforts.

game.name: Phase Shift - Threats Beyond the Network (Asia, PSP Mini)
game.description: Phase Shift - Threats Beyond the Network (Asia, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: Phase Shift - Threats Beyond the Network
game.plot: Phase Shift follows the story of Xargis, a genius programmer fighting against cyber terrorism in the future.[CR]Defeat your enemies and protect The Network![CR]Visually represented as a "Ship Battle", Phase Shift presents a unique 2D Arcade Shooter game with a warp mechanic, providing a vibrant and dynamic game-play.

game.name: Pile Up! Bakery (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Can you make a mountain out of sweets and candies? Drop cakes, pies, and more from your assembly line and pile them up to the sky! You are up against the clock so you need to place each sweet in just the right spot to help build your tower of treats as high as possible. Things start simple but you will soon find it's not quite as easy as taking candy from a baby.

game.name: Pinball Duel (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Face off against the computer or a friend in the crazy frenetic world of double sided Pinball Duel. With two balls being catapulted around the pinball arena, nail the timing and use your flippers to smack them at just the right angle. Tag the bonus target marks to win big prizes, unleash more balls and work to reach the coveted 10,000 point mark. Trying to catch up, but running out of luck, be devious and tilt the board to gain an advantage!

game.name: Pipe Madness (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Put together some pipes -- pronto! In Pipe Madness, you must rush to complete your pipeline before the liquid catches up with you or all of your hard work will be ruined. Combat the flowing liquid over endless levels and reach that unbeatable high score. Maximize your bonuses by building intricate pipe networks.

game.name: Puzzle Scape (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Puzzle Scape is a block busting game where the player arranges same colored blocks to 2x2 formations to explode them. All adjacent same colored blocks will also explode in a chain reaction. The player can move the blocks by swapping two adjacent blocks horizontally. There are several power-ups to aid the player. The game modes include two single player modes and several multiplayer modes including a co-op mode.

game.name: Quiz Animania (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Can you correctly identify a duck by only looking at a zoomed in picture of its bill? How about spotting an rhino by just by a flashing image of its rump? Quiz Animania is a lighthearted game that will challenge your knowledge of the animal kingdom. Animal lovers will have their wits tested as they race to identify animals before time runs out. For big bonuses look for chance questions that could be your shot to earn loads of points and come back from behind to beat your friends. Play solo in the certification mode or head-to-head with a friend. Good Luck![CR]Recommended for two players and playable using a single PSP(r) system.

game.name: Ramen Heaven (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Slurp up the fun in the quirky PSP(r) soup game Ramen Heaven. Use your chopsticks to collect bubbles of oil floating on the soup, and place them in your spoon to eat up, increasing your satisfaction gauge. A bowl of ramen has never had so many obstacles in it, knock into an egg and your oil bubble will split up, braise a naruto, and it may pop altogether. Heat up the fun by grabbing a friend and competing head to head! [CR]Recommended for one or two players and playable using a single PSP(r) system.

game.name: Rasmus Klump and the Big Maze (Denmark, PSP Mini)
game.description: Rasmus Klump and the Big Maze (Denmark, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: Rasmus Klump and the Big Maze

game.name: Rasmus Klump in Pingonesien (Denmark, PSP Mini)
game.description: Rasmus Klump in Pingonesien (Denmark, PSP Mini)

game.name: Rasmus Klump is Saving the Chickens (Denmark, PSP Mini)
game.description: Rasmus Klump is Saving the Chickens (Denmark, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: Rasmus Klump is Saving the Chickens

game.name: Red Bull X-Fighters (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: With Red Bull X-Fighters, gamers around the world can now experience the thrill and excitement of the best Freestyle Motocross riders in the world on Xbox LIVE Arcade and PC. The game puts you, the player, on centre stage of the Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour. Take your bike, launch from huge ramps and pull off truly stunning and jaw-dropping tricks while up to 40 feet in the air. Do you have what it takes to wow the crowd and pull out all stops in the attempt to finish as overall champion? But don't expect this to be an easy challenge. You've got to master the right level of acceleration and braking, balance your body and all the while performing death-defying maneuvers on 100-foot leaps - don't crash or it will ruin your run.

game.name: Reef Aquarium (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Download the magnificent coral reefs of the deep blue to your console. Feel the atmosphere of the underwater world and watch its inhabitants swimming around you. You will see the most vivid ocean fishes there. Fish library will help you to find out more about these amazing creatures. And do not forget to feed fish and play with them - fish are very easy to get upset.

game.name: Retro Cave Flyer (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Guide your landing craft through 23 challenging levels, solving puzzles and avoiding hazards whilst finding and saving the stranded scientists. Get them all back to the mothership before the planet goes super nova. Great gameplay, perfect physics, vibrant visuals and a storming soundtrack make this the best lunar lander arcade puzzler available. [CR]All game code, art, design (c) Big Head Games Ltd. 2010 Music: Stage One composed by Space Manoeuvres, (c) 1999 Hooj Choons. All rights reserved. [CR]Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation(r)Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

game.name: Revoltin' Youth (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: The evil Big-Wig has covered the characters town in crummy marketing gibberish. It's up to you to control three rebellious characters through 50+ levels of headache inducing puzzles in Revoltin' Youth, a puzzle/platformer game featuring a unique pixel-art style and a robust soundtrack.

game.name: Robin Hood - The Return of Richard (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Robin Hood - The Return of Richard (USA, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: Robin Hood - The Return of Richard

game.name: Rocks N' Rockets (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Thousands of meteors are heading towards earth! Are you ready to take the hero's seat in this mesmerizing arcade game?[CR]Are you ready to take the hero's seat in this mesmerizing arcade game? We hope so. Civilization is threatened by a terrifying, multi-phased meteor attack--thousands of strange meteors are heading towards Earth! Your mission is to protect our cities by controlling a rocket launcher that is built to protect each city.[CR]Features[CR]* Waves of increasingly destructive meteors[CR]* Innovative power ups[CR]* Over 100 exciting levels

game.name: Ronnie O'Sullivan's Snooker (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Here with Ronnie O'Sullivan's Snooker, you play through the highlights of Ronnie's career culminating in his most famous World Championship wins. Have you got what it takes to re-create his many stunning victories?[CR]Ronnie guides you through the game, giving advice, even taking you back to his home table where you can refine your skills in his very own practice room.[CR]Memory Stick Duo(tm) Compatible: 2MB[CR]Download of this product is subject to the Sony Entertainment Network Terms of Service/User Agreement and any specific additional conditions applying to this product. If you do not wish to accept these terms, do not download this product. See Terms of Service for more important information.[CR]One time fee for use of downloads on up to 2 activated compatible Home Console systems and 3 activated compatible Portable Console systems.[CR]See Health Warnings for important health information before using this product.[CR]Library programs (c)Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. exclusively licensed to Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Software Usage Terms apply, See eu.playstation.com/legal for full usage rights.[CR]Ronnie O'Sullivan and his name, likeness, image and biographical data have been used under license from Ronnie O'Sullivan. The use of the names or images of any other snooker players, events, organizations, tournaments or venues within this game are intended as factual biographical references only and this game is NOT endorsed by such third parties.

game.name: Route 66 (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Mad" Madeleine Mayflower is a professional biker that, after competing for more than twenty years, decides to take a break from the race circuit, traveling with her motorcycle to explore the historical route 66 alongside her grandfather.[CR]Route 66 is a straightforward hidden object game, where the objective is to find all the items from a list at the bottom of the screen, on picturesque locations around the United States filled with assorted paraphernalia. The hint button is a badge at the bottom-right, that shows the position of one of the required objects when activated.[CR]Three mini-games appear between each location, giving extra hints to the player when completed. They are implementations of classic games like Simon with checkers pieces, a matching game with bottle taps and Reversi/Othello.

game.name: Rumble Trucks (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Rumble Trucks is an exciting 3D racing game with 9 vehicles and 24 tracks across 3 unique worlds.[CR]You can race along dense jungle tracks, challenging spooky cemetary courses and all action warzone battlefield assault courses.[CR]Tricks, jumps, trophies and achievements all go to make Rumble Trucks an excellent fully featured PSP minis title.[CR]Ready steady RUMBLE!

game.name: Run Ghost Run (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: An infernal storm begins and you think that an old castle could be your salvation. You will soon discover that this is one of the worst decisions you have ever made. The doors close and you begin to try and find a way out, but what you don't know is that you will never be alone. Shoot, jump, run and try to avoid the hundreds of ghosts who never want you to leave. Enjoy 36 levels and 2 game modes of this fun and super addictive adventure. The longest night of your life has just begun...

game.name: SAR - Search and Rescue (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: SAR - Search and Rescue (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: Shapo (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Shapo is a challenge that will keep you on the edge![CR]Shapo is a challenge that will keep you on the edge! Balance the scales as you place shapes made of different materials. Play more than 150 levels in Classic or Puzzle mode to unlock the greatest wonders of the world. Stunning art brings 15 wonders of the world to life! Enjoy exciting power ups such as the material bomb and line bomb. Each ball and shape has a different weight so be careful when placing your pieces![CR]*Classic Mode: Create lines to remove balls. Match sequential lines and watch the combo multiplier grow![CR]*Puzzle Mode: Complete increasingly complicated levels by filling the grid with the given balls.

game.name: Sheep Defense (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Hungry bears and crazy wolves are after your flock of soft, fluffy sheep and it's up to you and a friend to control two brave, valiant sheep dogs and protect the herd. Howl, bark or even unleash a super powered growl to scare away ferocious invaders. But bark too much and your stamina may decrease leaving you temporarily powerless to protect your cute cuddly friends. [CR]Recommended for two players and playable on a single PSP(r) system only.

game.name: Shift Extended (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: SHIFT is a successful game that has already puzzled the mind of over 14 million players around the world. It is now finally coming to the PlayStation(r)3 and the PSP(tm) in a new 'extended' version with new levels and gameplay mechanics.[CR]As a subject of a science experiment, you have to escape the 120 levels of the game and avoid all the carefully crafted traps. Fortunately you have a unique power called 'SHIFT': floor, ceiling, walls...everything is reversed by pressing a single button![CR]Will you be able to get out alive of this experiment?[CR]Be extra careful as the number of traps doubled in this version!

game.name: Sky Force (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Sky Force is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up video game series created by the Polish video game developer Infinite Dreams Inc.. The gameplay is reminiscent of Capcom's 19XX series and Seibu Kaihatsu's Raiden series, featuring a weapon upgrade system and large end of stage bosses.[CR]Sky Force Reloaded:[CR]The second outing was initially released for Symbian, Pocket PC and Palm webOS in 2006 and was later released for iOS (2009), Iphone ios 7 (2010) and PSP (2011). The PSP version of "Sky Force Reloaded" was simply named "Sky Force". The 2D graphics style of the first title was combined with some 3D polygon objects like destructible towers. It received a remake for mobile in 2016, with a PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One versions released in 2017, and also a Nintendo Switch version released in 2018.

game.name: Smashbreak (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Use paddles on either side of the screen to deflect balls and break the blocks in the middle. Collect power-ups and use your SMASH ability to send the ball flying and break multiple blocks at once. Two-player mode lets two people play on a single PS3(tm) system or PSP(r) system to play head to head.

game.name: Snake Warriors - Training (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Choose from nine characters and start your career as a Snake Master in Snake Warriors: Training. Show your talent as a driver at the race tracks in Snake Race and demonstrate your patience and skill in avoiding hitting your own body in Classic Training. But are you sure you can also do this in the dark in Night Training? [CR]If you possess all these skills, then show you have an excellent memory in the Snake Memory game, but beware: in some levels you will even need to combine all your talents with numerical skills. If you turn out to be good at all these games and you have also mastered picking up moving items in Hunting Targets, you will be heading for a successful career in which you can unlock many pieces of clothing for your snake as well as medals throughout the 75 levels. [CR]Specifications: [CR]- 75 levels[CR]- 5 games[CR]- 9 characters[CR]- 3 save slots

game.name: Snowy - The Bear's Adventures (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Snowy - The Bear's Adventures (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Help the white bear Snowy to get to Arctic. Could it be possible for a little white bear to withstand a whole army of evil monsters? For sure, if we're talking about charming and fearless Snowy. Armed to the teeth with the snowballs, he is turning his enemies into large balls of snow and ice figures. But this snowballs throwing champion doesn't want to do any harm, he simply wants to get back home to Arctic and collect as many prizes and bonuses on his way as possible. And he will make it! But only with your help. Attention: During the game play, more then 10000 snowballs will be made. All of the monsters will be defrosted afterwards. No white bears will get hurt.

game.name: Space Shooter for Two Bucks!, A (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Space Shooter for Two Bucks!, A (USA, PSP Mini)
game.title_clean: Space Shooter for Two Bucks!, A

game.name: Stand O'Food (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Stand O'Food is a fastfood restaurant simulator with where you need to cook up veggie, omelet, beef, chicken or fish burgers, before the long line of impatient customers becomes too big. If you earn money for each session, you can upgrade your restaurant with music, dressings, faster cooking, and other improvements. This is a fast, instant play game with more than 100 levels and 80 different burger recipes.

game.name: Star Hammer Tactics (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: When Novus falls, will you be its saviour? Take command of the infamous NSG-14 as Lieutenant Fredan Dyce in Campaign mode, or battle your friends for supremacy in 'hotseat' Skirmish mode.[CR]With every ship of Naval Strike Group 14 under your direct command, launch missiles to annihilate your enemies from afar or close in for explosive ship-to-alien broadsides. [CR]* Engaging turn-based tactical battles : individually control each ship in your fleet [CR]* Easy-to-learn rules; learn to play in minutes! [CR]* OPERATION STAR HAMMER : In this epic Campaign, play as Lieutenant Fredan Dyce, earn promotions within the Alliance Navy and come face-to-face with the single greatest threat to the safety of your homeworld, Novus. [CR]* Skirmish modes : create your own custom fleet, then duel against a friend in "hotseat" multiplayer, or take on the challenging AI

game.name: Super Fruitfall Deluxe (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Move your fruit around the grid, group them together and watch as they disappear from your screen.[CR]Organise your fruits into straight lines or cunningly stack them on top of each other to clear more than one fruit type and earn big bonuses.[CR]Take on level after level of fruity puzzle action within the time limit.

game.name: Supermarket Mania (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Supermarket Mania, at its core, operates as a time management sim set in a grocery store. Or rather, five grocery stores. With a large 50-stage story mode, players take control of Nikki and must manage time and products to keep grocery stores stocked for customers. Besides just working to keep stores stocked, players have to deal with a competing grocery store. By working with speed and dedication, players earn enough cash to upgrade their grocery stores to better compete with the rival store. [CR]Besides the large story mode, the game also features an alternate "Endless Shift" mode with bonuses, five total shops, and seven different types of customers. Supermarket Mania features over a dozen different products to manage, and over twenty upgrades for the stores. [CR]Gameplay is seen and controlled on the bottom (touch) screen of the Nintendo DSi, and the game is viewed from an isometric angle similar to classic Sims games or old PC strategy titles. The top screen is largely used for statistics and other information.

game.name: Swap Zap (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Pam can run and jump around in an increasingly hazardous space-truck, dodging falling blocks and dangers that slowly fill the cargo holds.[CR]Enemies pop out of the space-trucks nooks and corners to gnaw at our heroine.[CR]As if that wasn't enough Pam needs to collect all power cores in each level in order to start her ship.[CR]The only tool available to her is the Swap-Zapper which enables its user to change places with anything it zaps![CR]With this tool Pam can instantly climb to high places, teleport blocks to crush enemies, zap away ticking time bombs and switch places with sharp cargo falling straight for her.[CR]Each level of the game takes place in a cargo container of the huge space truck.[CR]The objective of each level is to collect all the power cores needed to open the airlock into the next hold, effectively shrinking the distance between Pam and the control room of the spacecraft.

game.name: Sweet Reversi (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Outsmart your friends and take all of their macaroons for yourself in this tasty take on the reversi game. Stay on your toes, strategize and make sure you are always thinking several steps ahead as you trap your opponent's macaroons and turn them into yours in this deliciously fun puzzle game.

game.name: Telegraph Crosswords (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Play crossword puzzles from the 'Telegraph' like you've never played them before![CR]Discover a whopping 500 puzzles of multiple types. You're in for many hours of gameplay![CR]With its handy interface and intuitive controls, this game transfigures the classic pen-and-paper experience.[CR]Notable features include:[CR]* A huge selection of quick puzzles, cryptic puzzles and general knowledge puzzles!* Registration of best times in the Hall of Fame.* Interactive hints prevent you from being stuck!* Auto-save as you go: you can stop and resume a puzzle at any time!

game.name: Telegraph Sudoku & Kakuro (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Play number-puzzles from the 'Telegraph' like you've never played them before! Discover a whopping 500 puzzles of multiple types. You're in for many hours of game play![CR]* Sudoku: Classic 9x9 Sudoku grids in 4 levels of difficulty.[CR]* Mini-Sudoku: Easier 6x6 grids.[CR]* Sudoku-X: 9x9 grids in which the diagonals must also be filled with all numbers from 1 to 9.[CR]* Jigsaw Sudoku: 9x9 grids with uncommon box shapes.[CR]* Kakuro: With its handy interface and intuitive controls, this game transfigures the classic pen-and-paper experience.

game.name: Terminator, The (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: The Terminator for PSP is an explosive top-down all action shooter with an episodic Story Mode and endless Quick Play mode.[CR]The player is Kyle Reese and the objective is to help him progress through several levels to access Skynet's core. Visually, the environment is virtually the same--a desolated area full of wreckage and debris. In addition, an intense soundtrack is included as well as the weapons fire and explosion sound effects.

game.name: This is Football Management (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.description: This is Football Management (Europe, PSP Mini)

game.name: Tiger Trouble (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.plot: The game is played against asymmetrical opponents where one controls three Tigers and the other controls 15 Goats. Objective of the Tigers is to hunt down the Goats while the Goats attempt to lock the Tigers ability to move. [CR]Players can choose to be either Tiger or Goat. Both require different playing strategy. The arrangement of pieces, method of play and the rules of capture vary from game to game.

game.name: Top Trumps - NBA All Stars (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Top Trumps - NBA All Stars (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: Treasures of Montezuma, The (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Treasures of Montezuma, The (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: VT Tennis (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: VT TennisTM is the most competitive and addictive tennis game for the PSP. Virtual Toys' experience in this kind of games will help you become the new international circuit champion. Train your budding tennis star to serve, lob and smash your way to victory with precision swipes in all directions, using its innovative controls! Advance your player statistics in this fast-paced tournament of game modes, featuring Quickmatch, Tennis School and World Championship! Play a quick singles or doubles match on one of the available courts. In quick match mode, you can modify all the game settings such as the game difficulty, sex of your player and the number of games and sets per match. There are various locked courts which you can only play once you have progressed in career mode. The objective in career mode is to become number 1 in the world rankings. To do this, the player will have to unlock courts as he competes in championships all over the world. At the start of career mode, the player will see himself in last place in the rankings. From this moment on, you must battle your way up to be among the top players. You can play on all types of surface: grass, clay and hard courts and learn the best techniques for winning each tournament on the different surfaces. Seventeen tough courts, each more difficult than the last, stand between you and your final victory.

game.name: Vector TD (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: In this entry in the popular tower defense genre, players aim to eliminate the Vectoid threat before they reach the end of the path. You do this by constructing towers along the path to attack oncoming Vectoids. Success is not based solely on the types of tower you select, but where you place them and what upgrade and bonus options you take.[CR]At your disposal are eleven flavors of towers, each of which can be upgraded to level 10 (increasing the tower's damage and range). The Green Lasers, for example, lock onto one Vectoid and deal ongoing damage. The Red Spammer fires heat-seeking rockets at random targets in range. Blue Ray towers drain power and cause Vectoids to slow down. The in-game guide lists each tower in detail. Every few waves you'll also be rewarded with a Yellow Energy Cell, which you can use to purchase one of three Boosts. Damage and Range Booster towers can be placed on a grid to increase the stats of other towers around it.[CR]Vector TD for PSP features eight maps (two Beginner, three Normal, three Extreme) as well as all eleven tower and seven enemy types of the original Flash version. Exclusive to the minis version is a brand-new control interface -- you'll be able to select each gri' using the D-pad or analog stick and place/upgrade towers.

game.name: Vibes (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Welcome to a brand new era of rhythm! Let Vibes take you on a heart-pounding, button-bashing journey through a huge variety of music tracks. Your accuracy, timing and finger speed will be taken to the limit in this unique test of rhythm. Follow the pattern of music and chase the big combos and high scores! Amaze yourself by beating all the difficulty levels which push your fingers to breaking point! Do you have what it takes to become number one?

game.name: Where is my Heart (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Where is my Heart (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: World Ping Pong Championship (Europe, PSP Mini)
game.description: World Ping Pong Championship (Europe, PSP Mini)

game.name: Yeti Sports Pengu Throw (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Yeti Sports Pengu Throw (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: Yummy Yummy Cooking Jam (USA, PSP Mini)
game.description: Yummy Yummy Cooking Jam (USA, PSP Mini)

game.name: Zenonia (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Zenonia is an action role-playing game created, developed, and published by Gamevil for iOS, Android, PlayStation Portable, Nintendo DSi, Zeebo and Windows Mobile. It was released on the App Store on May 24, 2009 and on the Google Play Store on March 27, 2010. It was released for the PlayStation Portable on October 12, 2010.[CR]The main character, Regret, is controlled through use of an on-screen d-pad, which is located in the lower left corner of the screen. There are many side quests that the player can choose to complete in order to further explore the world. The main storyline can be changed by the player depending on whether they decide to make certain choices that will cause their character's alignment to shift more quickly towards good or evil. There are four classes in which the player can choose from: Paladin, Warrior, or Assassin, each having a unique fighting style. The game also features hundreds of different weapons, and a full class skill tree for each of the classes. Gamevil claims that Zenonia has 40 hours of gameplay.[CR]Regret's in-game appearance changes based upon his equipped weapon and armor set.

game.name: Zombie Racers (USA, PSP Mini)
game.plot: Take on the best Zombie Racers in this automotive zombie bloodfest.[CR]*Story Mode: race and kill zombies, use zombie kills to upgrade your car, come first to unlock the next track.[CR]*Free Roaming Mode: go anywhere, use weapons on zombies and each other, compete in three new game modes, Dusk To Dawn, 666 Zombies and Every Last Drop.[CR]*Unlock new cars and tracks.[CR]*10 cars, from pickups and monster 4x4s to drift cars and even a golf cart.[CR]*14 tracks, from a forest and a cornfield to an airport and shopping mall.[CR]*Punk soundtrack from Bankrupt.
